# strip-ansi [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/sindresorhus/strip-ansi.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/sindresorhus/strip-ansi)

> Strip [ANSI escape codes](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ANSI_escape_code)

## Install

`sh $ npm install --save strip-ansi `

## Usage

```js var stripAnsi = require(‘strip-ansi’);

stripAnsi(‘x1b[4mcakex1b[0m’); //=> ‘cake’ ```

## CLI

`sh $ npm install --global strip-ansi `

```sh $ strip-ansi –help

Usage
$ strip-ansi <input-file> > <output-file> $ cat <input-file> | strip-ansi > <output-file>
Example
$ strip-ansi unicorn.txt > unicorn-stripped.txt

```
